pages.text: The $(thing)Pipez Mod$() allows for the transportation of water and electricity.$(br2)Several features have been disabled from the mod, leaving only the aforementioned capabilities.

pages.title: Pipe Wrench
pages.text: The $(thing)Pipe Wrench$() allows the configuration of both $(thing)Fluid Pipes$() and $(thing)Energy Pipes$(). The $(thing)Wrench Head$() is made like any other tool head; in this case, wrought iron is worked on the anvil.$(br2)The tool head is then crafted with an iron rod to make the wrench.

Pipes can be configured by $(#FF00FF)shift + right clicking$() on the end of a pipe while holding a wrench. This cycles between its modes: Insert (default), Extract, Disconnected. In the Extract mode, an extra ring can be seen connecting to the block face it is pulling from.
$(thing)Energy Pipes$() allow for the flow of electricity, or $(thing)FE$().
$(thing)Fluid Pipes$() allow for the movement of water.$(br2)$(bold)Note:$() Fluid Pipes can only move water. Moving molten metal will cause it to be deleted.
